DOC.brief_summary: A 16 session curriculum, developed for noncustodial African American and Latino fathers to improve knowledge, attitudes and skills and enable participants to remain non-violent towards their partners will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Men of Color Fatherhood Education and Violence Prevention Project
DOC.criteria: Noncustodial fathers African American or Latino At high risk for violence (prior perpetration, un/underemployment) Substance abusers
